sentence: My sister has already cooked a big cake.
They have already gone to the sports center.
Your friend has already come to the party.
My father has worked in China for a long time.
My friend and I have already had our breakfast.
My aunt’s baby has just broken my phone.
I have studied at the library for one hour.
They have lived in this flat for many years.
I have worked as a lawyer for two years.
I have just come back from my perfect holiday.
My mom has just sent you a message.
My husband has just bought a new rug for our bedroom.
I have seen this film several times before.
I have been to the USA many times.
He has been our teacher for four years now.
He has just finished her homework and can go for a walk.
I have thought about it for two hours.
It has been cold for the last three days.
We have eaten at that restaurant many times.
I have had this book for three months.
Everybody in the class has already finished the test.
I have forgotten my documents in the study.
Joanne Rowling has written several stories about Harry Potter.
My parents have just bought a new car.
My father has worked in New York for three years.
